info.title: ApplicationsIndividualDetail
info.description: Common ApplicationsIndividualDetail API for IFP and MA Lines of Business.

get.summary: Get the details of a submitted application.
get.description: This API returns the required details of a submitted application for IFP and MA lines of business.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique application identifier for retrieving the application data. (confirmation number associated with the application)

200.description: provides the application details associated with the id.
